short_summary: Rfap for Design Services for 19 Wing Comox Office Buildings
description: Construction de Defence Canada is calling for Abbreviated Proposals for design services for the construction of two (2) new buildings, including civil and site services, at 19 Wing Comox.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### CX230206: 19 Wing Office Buildings

**Tender Overview**
Defence Construction Canada is soliciting Abbreviated Proposals from architectural and engineering consulting firms to provide services for the design and construction of two new buildings, including civil and site services, at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Comox, British Columbia. The project includes civil and site services, building design, and construction documents in three distinct packages.

**Scope of Work**
The selected firm will be responsible for the following services:

* Design development, construction documents, and assistance during the tender call and construction phases
* Three distinct packages: Civil and Site Services, Building 1, and Building 2
* Provide design in compliance with the established criteria and regulations

**Evaluation Criteria**
Firms will be evaluated based on their technical capabilities, experience, and responsiveness to the Request for Abbreviated Proposals (RFAP). The RFAP documents will outline the evaluation criteria in detail.

**Security Requirements**
The selected firm must comply with the security requirements outlined in the RFAP documents.

**Duration and Milestones**
The estimated construction cost of the three phases of the project is approximately $11,500,000.00. The project timeline will be defined in the contract with the successful bidder.

**How to Submit a Bid**

* Potential bidders can access the bidding documents and submit their proposals through the MERX Electronic Bidding System on or before the closing date and time
* Bidders can also obtain contract award results from the Defence Construction Canada website at [Contract Activity - Defence Construction Canada](https://dcc-cdc.gc.ca/)

**Important Dates**

* Tender Closing Date: 2023-05-16T14:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2023-05-16

**Contact Information**

* Anne McCuaig, Defence Construction Canada
* Email: [anne.mccuaig@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:anne.mccuaig@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 613-794-5281
